actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-606.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 388 - 6 (Record Vote No: 155).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4326) to amend the Small Business Act to strengthen the role of the small, innovative firms in federally funded research and development as a base for technological innovation to meet agency needs and to contribute to the growth and strength of the Nation's economy.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4326 (Small business research).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4326) to amend the Small Business Act to strengthen the role of the small, innovative firms in federally funded research and development as a base for technological innovation to meet agency needs and to contribute to the growth and strength of the Nation's economy.
